summary: Tested CraftForge multi-tenant SaaS application focusing on 3 bug fixes: quick work item addition in setup wizard, sidebar logo/company initials, and notifications dropdown. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend registration and setup wizard redirect working correctly. Session persistence issues prevent complete frontend testing.

integration_issues.issue: User sessions expire frequently, causing logout during testing and normal usage

passed_tests: Setup wizard step navigation (step 1 to step 2 confirmed)
Code review: handleAddWorkItem function correctly implemented (lines 187-201 in SetupWizardPage.jsx)
Code review: Sidebar company initials avatar implemented (lines 78-130 in DashboardLayout.jsx)
Code review: Notifications using Popover instead of Sheet (lines 377-444 in DashboardLayout.jsx)
Quick work item addition buttons have correct data-testid attributes (data-testid="quick-add-{name}")
Setup wizard form validation and step progression
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix user session persistence issue - users are getting logged out frequently which prevents proper testing and usage of the application. This is blocking thorough testing of the 3 implemented bug fixes (quick work item addition, sidebar logo/initials, notifications dropdown).

success_percentage.frontend: 70% (registration and basic navigation working, session persistence issues prevent complete testing)
